page.title: 18TRADE IN GREAT WENHAM
page.content: In Great Wenham there are no conventional shops or post office. However Corner Farm has a farm shop which sells fresh fruit, vegetables, ggs,plants and dairy produce including goats milk. Mrs.Richardson sells Victoria plums in season from the garage of her bungalow ced Roanoke and also breeds and sells Doberman Pincer dogs. At the beginning of the railway line walk there is a coalyard owned by Cawoods.There is also a boarding kennels which boards all kinds of animals such as dogs, cats and goats while people are away on holiday.
